tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_production (
  device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  energy_level FLOAT,
  location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE energy_production_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    production_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_level DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES renewable_energy_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_data (
    consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    consumption_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES renewable_energy_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_forecast_data (
    forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    forecast_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    forecasted_energy DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES renewable_energy_devices(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_analysis_data (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    analysis_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    analysis_result VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES renewable_energy_devices(device_id)
);
